pr4.op1: Just some background (Quiet music during the ceremony and cocktail hour)
pr4.op2: A special moment (A live musician or singer for the ceremony or first dance)

pr4.op6: Complete experience (live music for ceremony/cocktail, DJ/band for the party, with ambiance and pro production)

pr5.op2: Taco bar or typical Mexican food
